import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about-us', templateUrl: './about-us.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about-us.component.scss'] }) export class AboutUsComponent { }

About GreenStar

Welcome to GreenStar, your premier destination for top-quality refrigeration solutions. As a leading retailer and direct dealer, we specialize in providing a comprehensive range of refrigeration products, including chillers, deep freezers, visicoolers, backbars, pastry cabinets, and a wide selection of spare parts.

Our Commitment

At GreenStar, we are dedicated to delivering excellence in every aspect of our service. With years of industry expertise, we understand the critical role that refrigeration plays in various commercial and domestic environments. Whether you're a restaurant owner in need of reliable chillers, a grocery store seeking efficient deep freezers, or a bakery looking for state-of-the-art pastry cabinets, we have the perfect solution for you.
